item.title: How to Stream KCON L.A. Online for Free and Find Last-Minute Tickets
item.description: The world’s no. 1 K-pop festival is back in Los Angeles after kicking off its 2025 season in Chiba for KCON Japan.

item.title: ‘Squid Game’ Stars Byung Hun Lee and Yim Siwan to Make KCON L.A. 2025 Appearances
item.description: The annual K-pop festival features daytime panel and pop-up programming, along with three nights of all-star performances featuring HxW, NCT 127, Aespa, Monsta X, Key, IVE and more.

item.title: Academy Museum Sets K-Culture Night Event Marking CJ ENM’s 30th Anniversary and KCON
item.description: The Academy Museum of Motion Pictures has pacted with CJ ENM to host a K-Culture Night event to mark CJ’s 30th anniversary and the 13th edition of the KCON fan festival in downtown Los Angeles.

item.title: Academy Museum and CJ ENM Partner Up for Korean Content-Themed Event Ahead of KCON
item.description: The event, titled “K-Culture Night at Academy Museum with KCON,” will celebrated the K-pop-focused festival’s 13th anniversary with idols, actors and more.
